mechanism.description: Animations run at 30fps using setInterval. Each frame computes time-based values using sin/cos/random functions and sends the corresponding post-processing commands.

animations.name: Day to Night
animations.description: Smooth transition from warm day to cool night
animations.behavior: Temperature ramps from 4500K to 8000K while exposure drops from 0 to -2

animations.name: Cyberpunk Glitch
animations.behavior: Random chromatic aberration spikes (20% chance per frame), sinusoidal bloom and saturation

animations.name: Dream Sequence
animations.description: Soft ethereal waves with bloom and grain
animations.behavior: Dual-wave bloom (0.8-1.6), grain (0.05-0.15), and desaturated color (0.6-1.0)

animations.name: Neon Nights
animations.description: Vibrant RGB color cycling with bloom
animations.behavior: Phase-offset RGB gain cycling on highlights with pulsing bloom (1.0-2.0)

animations.name: Underwater
animations.behavior: Chromatic aberration waves (0.05-0.35), cool temperature (6500-7500K), negative tint, blue-shifted gain

animations.name: Fever Dream
animations.behavior: Chaotic temperature swings (3500-9500K), erratic saturation (0.3-1.7), grain pulses (0.0-0.3)

animations.name: Strobe Effect
animations.behavior: Binary alternation at 10Hz between bright (bloom 2.5, exposure +1) and dark (bloom 0.1, exposure -1)

animations.name: Color Shift
animations.behavior: Phase-offset RGB gain sinusoidal rotation (0.7-1.3) creating smooth hue cycling

animations.name: Breathing
animations.description: Slow expansion and contraction of light
animations.behavior: Sinusoidal exposure (-0.5 to +0.5), vignette (0.2-0.8), and bloom (0.475-0.875)
